original_solution_mapping.L1: The age of Jeremy three years from now will be 40+3 = <<40+3=43>>43 years
original_solution_mapping.L2: Since Sebastian age is four years more than Jeremy's, Sebastian is currently 40+4 = 44 years.
original_solution_mapping.L3: In three years, Sebastian will be 44+3 = <<44+3=47>>47 years old
original_solution_mapping.L4: The total age of Jeremy and Sebastian in three years will be 47+43 = <<47+43=90>>90
original_solution_mapping.L5: If the total age of Jeremy, Sebastian and Sophia in three years is 150, then Sophia's age in three years will be 150-90 = <<150-90=60>>60

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 1873.
    Returns: Sophia's age three years from now.
    """
    # L1
    jeremy_current_age = 40 # Jeremy's age is 40
    years_from_now = 3 # three years
    jeremy_age_in_three_years = jeremy_current_age + years_from_now

    # L2
    sebastian_age_difference = 4 # Sebastian is 4 years older than Jeremy
    sebastian_current_age = jeremy_current_age + sebastian_age_difference

    # L3
    sebastian_age_in_three_years = sebastian_current_age + years_from_now

    # L4
    jeremy_sebastian_total_age_in_three_years = sebastian_age_in_three_years + jeremy_age_in_three_years

    # L5
    total_age_all_three_in_three_years = 150 # The sum of the ages of Jeremy, Sebastian and Sophia in three years is 150
    sophia_age_in_three_years = total_age_all_three_in_three_years - jeremy_sebastian_total_age_in_three_years

    # FA
    answer = sophia_age_in_three_years
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: The age of Jeremy three years from now will be {jeremy_current_age}+{years_from_now} = <<{jeremy_current_age}+{years_from_now}={jeremy_age_in_three_years}>>{jeremy_age_in_three_years} years
Since Sebastian age is four years more than Jeremy's, Sebastian is currently {jeremy_current_age}+{sebastian_age_difference} = {sebastian_current_age} years.
In three years, Sebastian will be {sebastian_current_age}+{years_from_now} = <<{sebastian_current_age}+{years_from_now}={sebastian_age_in_three_years}>>{sebastian_age_in_three_years} years old

The total age of Jeremy and Sebastian in three years will be {sebastian_age_in_three_years}+{jeremy_age_in_three_years} = <<{sebastian_age_in_three_years}+{jeremy_age_in_three_years}={jeremy_sebastian_total_age_in_three_years}>>{jeremy_sebastian_total_age_in_three_years}

If the total age of Jeremy, Sebastian and Sophia in three years is {total_age_all_three_in_three_years}, then Sophia's age in three years will be {total_age_all_three_in_three_years}-{jeremy_sebastian_total_age_in_three_years} = <<{total_age_all_three_in_three_years}-{jeremy_sebastian_total_age_in_three_years}={sophia_age_in_three_years}>>{sophia_age_in_three_years}
